subject: dear
body:
dear
i am the chair of efcc in africa both ghana south africa and other
country in africa i was appointed by un to stop fruad and scam in
africa and also to monitor activitesof internet from the youth and
government official we arrested mr kingsley their base in ghana with a
draft of four million five hundred
thousand us dollars deposited allahgi suleiman the deputy governor of
central bank contacted me yestday and he sent me a copy of the draft
after much investigation we get information that mr kingsley is a
fruad that base in ghana and he mention your name that the draft
belong to you that why i am contact
me immediately with your information your full name your address state
of origin your direct telephone number and your id card be free and
contact me to recover your fund
Chairman EFCC.
MR. IBRAHIM MUSTAFA MAGU
Below is my number

subject: Re:   dear
body:
Hello Mr. Ibrahim Mustafa Magu,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm surprised to hear about this situation with Mr. Kingsley and the draft of four million five hundred thousand US dollars. I must admit, I don't recall having any dealings with a Mr. Kingsley.

Could you please provide more details about how my name was mentioned in this case? And what exactly is the role of Allahgi Suleiman, the deputy governor of central bank in this matter?

I appreciate your efforts in maintaining internet safety and preventing fraud across Africa.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Kevin
